about_the_game:
Info

The Land Of Sorrow is a beautiful, but deadly place. To go there is the only way for Pilo to save his sister. Her soul has been scattered around the Land. An evil force called Self has risen and tries to collect the soul fragments for an unknown reason.

Journey through this beautiful metroidvania as you defeat new creatures which grant Pilo new morphing abilities. Explore a variety of mysterious environments filled with anxious enemies, arcane puzzles and cryptic secrets.

Features


  • Morph and fight through multiple hand-drawn levels in the Land Of Sorrow.

  • Unlock new morphs by defeating bosses and monsters.

  • Upgrade morph abilities with tears to help yourself in battles!

  • Investigate new places to find secrets and collectables!

  • Solve puzzles to make your way forward.

  • You will find the mood and atmosphere very compelling with creepy sounds and beautiful music!

short_description: Save your sister from a certain death by finding her soul fragments in this mystical hand-drawn world! Utilize a variety of morphing abilities and fight through the dream-like Land Of Sorrow. It is known to be flooded with crying creatures who are creating a chaos under the dark soul Self.
